The colossal Pogg Ur-Pogg is another good option, due to being 2x2 he has more space to heal from and he has flurry.
September 17, 2022
tidge
I find this to be a peculiar Sword. Frankly: even as I see the obvious benefit of self-/ally-healing, I'd prefer NOT to be in a position where single clicks of healing are the difference between victory and loss. Having written that, I think the OP Kit (013) Pogg Ur-Pogg is a reasonable choice of Sword Bearer considering that the generated BST can also use the Sword's effect and can keep itself in the game by sending damage to the main unit. Outside of that figure, if I really wanted the potential healing to come into play I'd look to equipable figures with Giant Reach and/or Flurry, as well as some sort of move+attack. Most figures with STOP clicks could likely benefit as well, but they will have to be able to make an attack while on such a click to trigger the effect.
